install.name: SermonSpeaker
install.author: Thomas Hunziker - www.sermonspeaker.net
install.description: obSocialSubmit intern addon for SermonSpeaker 4.2 component (com_sermonspeaker)

param.name: template
param.default: New sermon: [title] read more details here [shorturl]
param.label: Template

param.name: mode
param.label: Work Mode
param.description: Whether to post the sermon as an article or a file. This will change the appearance on some social webs (like Facebook)

param.name: fullurl
param.label: Full URL
param.description: Select where the full URL should point.

param.name: shorturl
param.label: Short URL
param.description: Select where the short URL should point.

param.name: action
param.label: Action
param.description: Which action do you want your sermon to be published to a social network?
